vulnerabilities: Sensitive Cookie in HTTPS Session Without 'Secure' Attribute
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CWE-352) because it does not validate or verify the source of the request before processing it. This could allow an attacker to trick a user into making an unintended request to the web application. The function also exposes sensitive information (CWE-200) by setting cookies with sensitive session IDs without the 'Secure' attribute (CWE-614), which means that the cookie could be sent over an unencrypted HTTP connection, exposing it to potential interception and misuse.
